resources.string: NFC HCE NDEF REAL NFC AID
Emulate an NFC Forum class 4 type tag with a NDEF message.\nTo read the message you need a separate reader app running on a second device.
This example emulates an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT). It uses the aid-filter D2760000850101 for the APDU SELECT command.\nAn actual timestamp will be added to your message.
